changeSet.createView: SELECT P .ID AS product_id, sip.store_id AS store_id, COUNT ( sip.product_id ) AS available, P.NAME AS product_name, cat.NAME AS category_name, brn.NAME AS brand_name, P.model_no, sip.price AS buy_price, p.sale_price, P.description, P.barcode, P.image FROM inventory.store_in_product sip LEFT JOIN inventory.product P ON sip.product_id = P.ID LEFT JOIN inventory.category cat ON P.category_id = cat.ID LEFT JOIN inventory.brand brn ON P.brand_id = brn.ID WHERE sip.product_status = 1 GROUP BY P.ID, P.name, cat.NAME, brn.NAME, P.model_no, sip.price, p.sale_price, P.description, P.barcode, P.image, sip.store_id ORDER BY sip.store_id
